title: New Organisation looking for members.
body:
**Oblivion eSports** is currently looking for a team to compete under the newly formed organisation's name.

**We offer you the following.**

_TS3 server
LAN Attendance Opportunities
Mature Management
A fun but serious environment_

**What we expect from you.**

_Scheduled Training (At least 3 times a week)
Winning Results
To represent the organisation in a professional matter._

Ranks don't really matter, looking to form a team and to work on it from there. If you are interested, comment below.

replies.body:
Unsure whether too high for your mid silver group but still gonna try.

I currently main mid and top and am Gold 5 (winning slightly more LP than what i lose when i lose a game). I used to main support before a good friend took started to main it. I commonly use TS3 with my steam friends so i know my way around. I would be happy to be a sub for the team if you need that and not a main player. 

I play both tanky and squishy champs in all the roles as i listed above. I am very flexible.

In short;

IGN: Willis Dogg
Role: Mid/Top (used to sup)
Rank: Gold 5 (as of posting)

Edit: Gold 4 now
add me in game fam. im silver 1 top main have decent champ pool for a silver player. high gold mechanics at least..just improving my macro slightly

We are currently looking for a Jungler and a top laner.
We would prefer you to be around mid silver as that is the current average of the team.
If you do not want to play with low ranking players, don't bother commenting as this team is designed to be a low ranking team that we work on over time to improve as a unit.

For any further information on this team, please comment your questions or add me in game: "Alladx" is my IGN :)
Top/JG main here. Silver1 Closely approaching gold. Can also fill in adc if need be.
hit me up, i'll play on main

Rank: Bronze IV (as of posting)
